mbti.label: MBTI
mbti.description: Personality insights based on your test results

header.title: Psychological Profile
header.subtitle: Discover your career interests and personality type

descriptions.INTJ: The Architect - Strategic thinker with a plan for everything
descriptions.INTP: The Logician - Innovative inventor with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge
descriptions.ENTJ: The Commander - Bold, imaginative, and strong-willed leader
descriptions.ENTP: The Debater - Smart and curious thinker who loves a good debate
descriptions.INFJ: The Advocate - Quiet and mystical, yet very inspiring and tireless idealist
descriptions.INFP: The Mediator - Poetic, kind and altruistic people
descriptions.ENFJ: The Protagonist - Natural-born leader and people person
descriptions.ENFP: The Campaigner - Enthusiastic, creative, and sociable free spirit
descriptions.ISTJ: The Logistician - Practical and fact-oriented reliable worker
descriptions.ISFJ: The Defender - Dedicated and warm protector of those in need
descriptions.ESTJ: The Executive - Excellent administrator and natural leader
descriptions.ESFJ: The Consul - Extraordinarily caring, social and popular person
descriptions.ISTP: The Virtuoso - Bold and practical experimenter
descriptions.ISFP: The Adventurer - Flexible and charming artist
descriptions.ESTP: The Entrepreneur - Smart, energetic and perceptive people-person
descriptions.ESFP: The Entertainer - Outgoing, spontaneous and enjoyable person
